text: Our Girl Friday is a 1953 British romantic comedy movie directed by Noel Langley and is based on the 1934 novel The Cautious Amorist by Norman Lindsay. It stars George Cole, Kenneth Moore, Joan Collins, Robertson Hare, Felix Felton and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1953 romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Our Girl Friday
